text: @DrEricDing @TrulyUB Wtf is going on? Now @GovAbbott & @VP r saying everything's fine nothing to see here. They're withholding the data because it'll show how bad it really is & they don't want to be forced to close down again. They're purposely killing us PERIOD🤬 #coronavirus First Baptist Church
